DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose examine impact physical therapy ( PT ) intervention , include manipulation , physical activity level outside clinical environment person low back pain ( LBP ) measure objectively accelerometer subjectively questionnaires . The secondary purpose determine relationship exist objective physical activity , self-perceived disability pain catastrophizing thought , BMI , age , six-minute walk distance , low extremity muscle endurance . The tertiary purpose ass predictive value stand manual lumbar unload technique relief pain follow manipulation
DOC.detailed_description: At session 1 : Participants screen eligibility . Baseline outcome measure conduct ( self-report questionnaire physical performance test ) . Accelerometer instrument measure physical activity issue . At session 2 ( To occur least one-week later ) : Accelerometer data retrieve downloaded computer . Participant numerically rate low back pain level rest painful position . Participant receive manual distraction procedure . Participant rate pain level . Participant start physical therapy intervention ( manipulation spine , muscular strengthen cardiovascular exercise , education ) . Accelerometer reissue . At session 3 ( At least one-week later ) : Accelerometer collect data retrieve . Participant continue intervention ( manipulation , exercise , education ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient refer outpatient PT LBP relate diagnosis 2 . LBP without radiate pain distally knee > 3 month duration 3 . Ability read write English Spanish 4 . Age 18 70 year 5 . Able ambulate independently without assistive device 6 . Access computer cell phone email address and/or ability receive short text message 1 . No previous diagnosis , radiological evidence , clinical sign symptom instability , spondylolysis , spondylolisthesis , fracture , tumor metastasis spine 2 . No clinical indication nerve root pathology : straight leg raise le 45 degree , asymmetric low extremity deep tendon reflex , low extremity muscle strength deficit radiate pain , numbness tingle knee 3 . No surgical biological fusion spine 4 . No previous spinal surgery 5 . No known diagnosis osteoporosis rheumatoid arthritis 6 . No use oral steroid within past 6 month 7 . No epidural injection previous 4weeks lumbar spine region 8 . No current litigation , workman 's compensation disability claim low back injury 9 . No known pregnancy
